hero.title: How WishLink works
hero.subtitle: Learn how to create, manage and share your wish lists in a few simple steps.

steps.title: Create your list
steps.description: Choose a name for your list and add an optional description. You can create as many lists as you want.

steps.title: Add items
steps.description: Add products by pasting the store link or filling in manually. Set priorities and categories.

steps.title: Share
steps.description: Generate a unique link and share it with friends and family through any communication channel.

steps.title: No duplicate gifts
steps.description: When someone reserves an item, it gets marked as reserved for everyone, avoiding duplications.

workflow.title: Complete workflow
workflow.subtitle: See how simple it is to use WishLink from start to finish.

phases.title: Creation
phases.description: Create your list and add your dream products with all the information.

phases.title: Sharing
phases.description: Share the unique link with friends and family via WhatsApp, email, or social media.

phases.title: Reservations
phases.description: Your friends can reserve items, which get marked to avoid duplicate gifts.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account?
questions.answer: No, WishLink doesn't require registration. Your lists are stored locally in your browser.

questions.question: How much does it cost to use WishLink?
questions.answer: WishLink is completely free with no usage restrictions.

questions.question: Where is my data stored?
questions.answer: Your data is stored locally in your browser through localStorage.

questions.question: Can I access my list from another device?
questions.answer: Since it uses local storage, your lists are only available on the device where they were created. Share the link so others can view it.

questions.question: Is it possible to edit a list after it's created?
questions.answer: Yes, you can add, edit, and remove items at any time.
